price: 10. Tačiau tas, kuriam jo Įrašas bus įduotas iš už jo nugaros,
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu warāa ẓahrihi
